ComicInfo.Title: Barack Obama
ComicInfo.Summary: Barack Obama: Chris Ware and Abraham Lincoln discuss Barack Obama's life. He is born of a black African father and a white American mother. After working as a community organizer he steers his way through corrupt Illinois politics. After gaining national attention at the 2004 Democratic National Convention he launches a bid for the White House. Facing racist opposition in addition to opposition based on policy, he nevertheless wins the Presidency in 2008.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 18:46:35. [CVDB197052] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:36:10. [Issue ID 799277]
